radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild atelectasis at the lung bases; no pleural effusions; heart normal in size; small sliding hiatal hernia. Appendix fluid-filled and mildly dilated to 7 mm with mild wall thickening, mucosal hyperemia, and trace surrounding fat stranding; no extraluminal air or fluid collections. Scattered prominent mesenteric and retroperitoneal lymph nodes likely reactive; bladder and distal ureters unremarkable; prostate mildly enlarged; congenital fusion of the L4, L5, and upper sacral facet joints.
